content: beginner friendly two panel crochet summer top pattern this free pattern includes sizes us womens xs-xxl really simple with a nice stitch texture this pattern was made with the newest crocheters in mind this free pattern is was made as an exclusive undergroundcrafter com pattern thanks to marie at underground crafter for having me as a guest they are a wonderful community and resource for the fiber arts and crafting community materials #3 light/dk weight yarn i used paton s hempster color spice #3 light/dk weight yarn crochet hook size 5 mm scissors yarn needle stitch marker notes this crochet pattern is made as us women s sizes xs s m l xl xxl this top is made in 2 separate pieces and then sewn together 2 panels are made the same in this picture i have demonstrated with size small yarn needed 310 370 430 490 550 610 yards gauge blocked 12 half_double_crochet x 9 row = 4 measurements after blocked xs = 16 66 width across back x 14 77 length s = 18 66 width across back x 15 66 length m = 20 66 width across back x 16 55 length l = 22 66 width across back x 17 44 length xl = 24 66 width across back x 18 33 length xxl = 26 66 width across back x 19 22 length thanks for stopping by happy crocheting
